description: Invoice financing platform for UK small businesses

input.idea: AI-powered invoice financing platform that provides same-day funding for UK small businesses (1-10 employees) at 2-4% fees, using machine learning to assess creditworthiness from bank transactions and automate collections.
input.targetMarket: UK small businesses (1-10 employees), £100K-£2M annual revenue, B2B service companies with 30-90 day payment terms
input.problemStatement: Small businesses wait 30-90 days for client payments, creating cash flow gaps that prevent growth and force expensive overdrafts
input.solutionHypothesis: Real-time credit scoring from Open Banking data enables instant funding decisions, reducing approval time from 2 weeks to 2 hours

requiredElements: Specific percentage or metric (2-4% fees, 30-90 day terms)
Target market size specification (1-10 employees, £100K-£2M revenue)

qualityChecks.specificity: Should mention exact fee range (2-4%), approval time (2 hours vs 2 weeks)
qualityChecks.geographic: Must identify UK market, reference Open Banking (UK-specific)
qualityChecks.actionability: Facts should describe HOW it works (ML credit scoring, bank transaction analysis)
qualityChecks.avoidGeneric: No vague 'helps SMBs with financing' - must specify invoice financing, same-day funding
